title: Server Lag in games since 6.14
body: > Blizzard needs to fix their servers. It's lagging just like back in the day. Server lag. I can have 30 ping and 200 fps and my champion will freeze in place for 2 seconds and I am dead.  This started back ind 6.14. I don't know what you guys did but please ~~blizzard~~, fix your servers.

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes like this can be due to network instability like packet loss, and ends up causing delays like that.  Run the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to research and find out what's going on.  If any problems come up, it will also provide a list of steps to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues after!
